category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_bomline_quantity_attrib_maps_to
preference.preference_description: Defines the property of objects of type "BOMLine" to be used to map the unique attribute supplied in the International Material Data System (IMDS) files. A valid value is a property internal name. The default value is "bl_real_quantity".
